creditline: Given in memory of Mildred Light Lohmann
description: ruined archway over a street through a village; two men carrying bundles of sticks on their backs under arch; seated man with standing woman and girl at L; two musicians playing wind instruments in LRC

signed: below image, printed in black: [Rossini dis. e inc. A. Monte Aventino. B. Romitorio. Veduta delle antiche sostrurioni del Monte Aventino. C. Piramide di Cajo Cestio. T. 95 Roma 1823]
title: Veduta delle antiche sostrurioni del Monte Aventino
